summary: This module implements the G.711 audio codec family, providing encoder and decoder classes for PCM, PCMA (A-law) and PCMU (µ-law). It handles conversion between linear PCM samples and G.711 byte streams, integrates with AV frames and jitter buffering, and supports real‑time packetization for voice transmission.
business_intent: Enable reliable audio encoding and decoding in real‑time communication systems such as WebRTC and VoIP, ensuring compatibility with telephony equipment and efficient transmission of voice data over RTP.
